dct_description_sm: From: Hispania Victrix. Primera y segunda parte de la historia general de las Indias con todo el descubrimiento y cosas notables que han acaescido dende que se ganaron hasta el año de 1551. Con la conquista de México de la Nueva España.
Early woodcut world map showing California in peninsular form before it became common to show as an island. There are few place names. Text in Spanish.
Printed on 2 leaves. Showing the Americas on one and Asia, Europe, and Africa on the second.
Relief is shown pictorially with large mountain depictions on the European, Asian, and African continents.
Includes bibliographical references (p. xv-xvi) and indexes.
Glen McLaughlin with Nancy H. Mayo.
